prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a radiant yellow color and a unique floating shape.
Make a tiny Pokemon that has a mysterious aura, resembling a small humanoid figure.
Imagine a creature that can teleport and has luminescent features in vibrant colors.
Generate a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of the psychic type with distinctive traits.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek body and mesmerizing patterns that signify its psychic abilities.
Design a Pokemon with large expressive eyes and a playful demeanor, showcasing its intelligence.
Give me a Pokemon that balances tranquility and mischief, evident in its psychic powers.
